title.narrative: CCF/Strengthening of the local professionals on rehabilitation and inclusion of children with hearing impairment 15 counties in Moldova

description.narrative: CCF on edustuston nykyinen PYM-kumppani ja uusi hanke jatkaa kuulovammaisten lasten inklusiivisen koulutuksen edistämistä. Uusi hanke rakentuu edellisen hankkeen opetuksille ja niinpä tässä hankkeessa painopiste on kunnallisten ja valtakunnallisten ps yko-pedagogisten palveluiden henkilökunnan ja opetushenkilökunnan kouluttamisessa. Lisäksi järjestö jatkaa kuulovammaisten lasten ja perheiden tukemista kuulolaitteiden käytössä ja puhumisen opettelussa. Moldovan sosiaali- terveys- ja työministeri ö kutsuu järjestön usein asiantuntijakseen vammaisasioissa minkä lisäksi ministeriön toimintasuunnitelma 2018 ? 2021 on nostanut kuulovammaisten lasten valtavirtakoulutukseen sisällyttämisen yhdeksi tavoitteeksi. Teema on siis hyvin ajankohtainen M oldovassa ja tämä on CCF:n pitkäjänteisen työn tulosta. Hanke toteutuu noin 15 kunnassa eri puolilla Moldovaa.

The object of the project is to support to local professionals from Psycho-pedagogical assistance services and schools/kindergartens on rehabilitation and inclusion of children with hearing impairment in 15 counties of the Republic of Moldova. The outputs of the project is to ensure the rehabilitation and equal access to education of 30 children with hearing impairment; build capacity of the local 120 professionals from the inclusive education structures; improve families? knowledge and skills in children ?s rehabilitation effective participation and inclusion in society of their children. The project is a follow-up project for the project CCF is implementing 2018 - 2019 with the support of FLC instrument. The project builds on the lessons learned from that project: 1. rehabilitation of children with hearing disabilities is a slow process and it needs to be begin early for good results. Hence CCFs goal is that children with hearing disabilities are directed to the special health services before they reach th e school age. 2. Families with child with hearing disabilities often have multiple social problems and often require other kind of support also. CCF is advising families to get the support from local public authorities. 3. Families prefer to act locally. In this project CCF team will travel to rehabilitate the children in their own environment (home school or kindergarten) instead of families travelling to CCF for rehabilitation. 4. In order to reach sustainability it is necessary to focus in training the staff members of psycho-pedagogical institutions and teaching personnel.
